long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the latest sports news in your browser on each new tab.
Sportanima is a new tab extension keeping you updated with latest sports news around the world.
On each new tab you shall have a beautiful sport anime background, Sports news and a search field for your daily search needs.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to install the Sportanima Extension and set the new tab search to the one provided by the service.
The search features within the extension will be provided by Bing.

Backgrounds for Sportanima Extension were freely AI generated with: https://www.freepik.com/ai/image-generator

You can review our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy in the following links:
